VMap 3.0 is the raw version of the Wheat Genetic Variation Map 3 (VMap 3). 									
											
VMap 3.0 is built using reference IWGSC RefSeq v1.0, Aligner bwa (Version: 0.7.17-r1188) and caller FastCall 2 (TIGER_v1.0.3.jar). 

VMap 3.0 includes 1196 hexaploid wheat (AABBDD genome), 212 tetraploid wheat (AABB genome), and 220 Ae. tauschii (DD genome).

VMap 3.0 includes a total of 875,151,958 variants both biallelic and triallelic SNPs and Indels.	
											
Contact											
yf.guo@genetics.ac.cn (Yafei Guo); songxycc@gmail.com (Xinyue Song); flu@genetics.ac.cn (Fei Lu)					
"Institute of Genetics and Developmental Biology, Chinese Academy of Sciences"								
Homepage: https://plantgeneticslab.github.io/home/						
											
I. Genetic variation summary
